author: Zayan
title: Crypto OG Compares This Upcoming Listing to Cardano's 31,500% Gains From Last Cycle
text:
The cryptocurrency market is no stranger to meteoric rises, and seasoned investors are now drawing comparisons between Lightchain AI and Cardano (ADA) during its early days. With Lightchain AI's presale raising over $10.9 million at a price of $0.00525, crypto experts believe this upcoming listing could deliver gains reminiscent of Cardano's legendary 31,500% surge from the last bull cycle.
Cardano Success Story
Cardano, launched in 2017 by Ethereum co-founder Charles Hoskinson, is a leading blockchain platform known for its research-driven approach and focus on security, scalability, and sustainability. Its development follows five phases – Byron (foundation), Shelley (decentralization), Goguen (smart contracts), Basho (scaling), and Voltaire (governance). This structured approach has allowed Cardano to maintain perfect uptime since its launch.
A key milestone was its Initial Coin Offering (ICO) from 2015 to 2017, raising 108,845 BTC (around $62 million at the time), providing a strong foundation for growth.
Cardano's peer-reviewed research and layered architecture have created a secure, scalable platform. Its…
